common.communityCreatedSongs_event: Sing at a convention or event
common.communityCreatedSongs_filmAndTV: Sing popular songs from film and TV
common.communityCreatedSongs_subtitle: A big community already created thousands of songs in the UltraStar format.
common.communityCreatedSongs_vocaloid: Sing your favorite Vocaloid and UTAU songs
common.cookieBanner: This website uses cookies. By using this website, we assume your consent to this.
common.crossPlatformSection_p_1: UltraStar Play is a cross-platform application. You can run it on all major <emphasize>DESKTOP AND MOBILE</emphasize> platforms. Android TV and tvOS could be supported in the future as well.
common.crossPlatformSection_p_2: There are so many different platforms today for gaming, most singing games only focus on one.
common.crossPlatformSection_p_3: Thus, changing platforms often means losing a song collection. Sometimes you even have to buy extra microphones for a particular platform or game.
common.crossPlatformSection_p_4: Fortunately, UltraStar Play <emphasize>SOLVES THIS</emphasize> because it can evolve with your music taste and todays plethora of devices.
common.crossPlatformSection_p_5: Even better - you can <emphasize>MIX PLATFORMS</emphasize>. For example, start the main game on an iOS tablet and connect an Android device with the Companion App
common.easyToUseSection_list_1: You don't need to be a talented singer.
common.easyToUseSection_list_2: You don't need to buy a microphone.
common.easyToUseSection_list_3: You don't need to buy a new console.
common.easyToUseSection_p_afterList: Anyone can have a fun time singing! Just start UltraStar Play and <gradient>let the game guide your pitch</gradient> to the next highscore.
common.easyToUseSection_p_beforeList: There is a <gradient>free song package</gradient> that can be downloaded in-game within seconds.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_audience_det: Each song can have a background video or image. A delight for both, the audience and the singers.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_companionApp: Use your smartphone as mic or browse the song list with the UltraStar Play Companion App.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_controllerSu: No need to hang around your keyboard. Just use your gamepad to control UltraStar Play.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_openSongForm: UltraStar Play supports a widespread and open song format. Create and change songs as you please.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_playerAndMic: Configure each player and device individually. Quickly switch microphones between players.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_playlistsAnd: Handle large song collections by marking songs as favorites, adding playlists, or searching for songs by language, year, artist, etc.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_scoreMode_de: A cooperative score mode emphasizes SINGING TOGETHER with your loved ones. You can also turn off scores and ratings completely.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_solosDuetsGr: Sing a duet where each player has different lyrics and notes. Or throw a party and sing with up to 16 players at the same time.
common.featuresSection_featureCard_songEditor_d: The integrated song editor lets you create a sing-along version of any song you like - unlimited possibilities!
common.featuresSection_featureList_1: Pitch detection to guide your voice
common.featuresSection_imagineList_1: Throw a singing party with family and friends
common.featuresSection_imagineList_2: Break the highscore or sing duets together
common.featuresSection_imagineList_3: Create the songs you want, no matter your taste in music
common.featuresSection_imagineList_4: Use your smartphone as mic, no need to buy additional equipment
common.featuresSection_imagineList_5: Start the game anywhere, right from your smartphone
common.featuresSection_imagineList_title: Imagine what it would be like to...
common.introSection_documentationAndHelpLinks: Check out the {{wikiLink}} to get started, our {{faqLink}} for frequent question, or {{discordLink}} for help.
common.introSection_p_1: UltraStar Play is a singing game with boundless possibilities, without the need to buy additional hardware.
common.introSection_p_2: Players sing along their favorite songs and try to hit notes for points. Feel like a superstar while you break the highscore! Invite your family and friends to rock the virtual stage together!
common.openSourceSection_beyondThisGame_p_1: Open source software does not only implement a single game or solution, it can also be the <gradient>fuel for other projects</gradient>.
common.openSourceSection_beyondThisGame_p_2: People can use UltraStar Play to <gradient>learn by example</gradient>. And it has grown its own set of libraries, which are <gradient>shared with the community</gradient>, just like previous open source projects are <gradient>empowering UltraStar Play</gradient>.
common.openSourceSection_beyondThisGame_p_3: For instance, UltraStar Play is mentioned in a small paper called {{paperLink}}. That's possible <gradient>#OnlyWithOpenSource</gradient>.
common.openSourceSection_madeWithUnity_p_1: UltraStar Play is built on a <gradient>professional game engine</gradient> and modern tools to provide the <gradient>best experience for developers and players</gradient>.
common.openSourceSection_madeWithUnity_p_2: More than 50% of the world's video games are {{madeWithUnityLink}}. A <gradient>strong foundation</gradient> for UltraStar Play that can grow with new tools and platforms.
common.openSourceSection_p_getInvolved:
Make this YOUR GAME as well!
UltraStar Play is a free and open source project that belongs to everyone. Get involved, add styles, ideas, translations, or features on {{githubLink}}.
common.openSourceSection_whyOpenSource_p_1: Imagine that you would buy another singing game for your current console, only to find that the vendor shuts down the online features, or you lose your song collection when changing the device.
common.openSourceSection_whyOpenSource_p_2: This won't happen with UltraStar Play because it can <gradient>evolve with the future</gradient> as long as it has a contributing community behind it.
common.plannedFeaturesSection_detail: Support now the Kickstarter campaign so that we can get the best out of the project for you. It can only succeed with your help! Go to {{kickstarterLink}}.
common.songEditorSection_afterFeatureList: With all these features, creating a sing-along version for an UltraStar game <gradient>has never been easier.</gradient>
common.songEditorSection_featureList_1: Add notes by singing or button tapping
common.songEditorSection_furtherDocumentation: Check out the {{videoLink}} or {{documentationLink}} for details.
common.songEditorSection_p_1: The integrated <gradient>SONG EDITOR</gradient> allows to easily create a sing-along version of any song.
common.songEditorSection_p_2:
UltraStar Play's song editor combines features that previously required multiple tools.
Plus, you can quickly switch between editing and testing your song.
common.songEditorSection_title: Have a weird taste in music? <gradient>No problem!</gradient>
